00034 RainbruRPG::Network::GlobalURI::GlobalURI(){
00035 
00036 #ifdef WEBSITE_DEBUG
00037   adminSite="http://127.0.0.1/rpg/admin/";
00038   xmlSite="http://127.0.0.1/rpg/";
00039   LOGW("Using the local website (127.0.0.1)");

00042   xmlSite="http://rainbru.free.fr/rpg/";
00043   LOGI("Using the real website");
00044 #endif //WEBSITE_DEBUG
00045 
00046   homeSetup();
00047 
00048 }

00065 const char* RainbruRPG::Network::GlobalURI::
00066 getAdminAdress(const char* file)const{
00067

00069   ostringstream oss;

00100 std::string RainbruRPG::Network::GlobalURI::
00101 getUserDirFile(std::string file) const
00102 {
00103   LOGI("GlobalURI::getUserDirFile called");
00104   ostringstream oss;
00105   oss << this->userDir;
00106   oss << file;
00107 
00108   LOGCATS("returned value is '");
00109   LOGCATS(oss.str().c_str());
00110   LOGCATS("'");
00111   LOGCAT();
00112 
00113   return oss.str();
00114 }

00121 void RainbruRPG::Network::GlobalURI::homeSetup(){
00122   // Get RainbruRPG user's directory
00123   userDir=getenv("HOME");
00124   userDir+="/.RainbruRPG/";
00125   LOGCATS("Setting user's HOME directory to'");
00126   LOGCATS(userDir.c_str());
00127   LOGCATS("'");
00128   LOGCAT();
00129 
00130   // Creating directory if inexists
00131   boost::filesystem::path homePath(userDir.c_str(), 
00132                                    boost::filesystem::native);
00133   LOGCATS("Boost path returns '");
00134   LOGCATS(homePath.string().c_str());
00135   LOGCATS("'");
00136   LOGCAT();
00137 
00138   bool ex=boost::filesystem::exists( homePath );
00139   if (ex){
00140     LOGI("Home directory alerady exists");
00141   }
00142   else{
00143     LOGI("Home directory doesn't exists, creating it");
00144     boost::filesystem::create_directory( homePath );
00145   }
00146 
00147   // Copying necessary files
00148   installConfigFile("options.xml");
00149   installConfigFile("languages.xml");
00150   installConfigFile("ogre.cfg");
00151   installConfigFile("objects.xml");
00152   installConfigFile("server.xml");
00153 }

00162 std::string RainbruRPG::Network::GlobalURI::
00163 getShareFile(std::string file) const
00164 {
00165   LOGI("GlobalURI::getShareFile called");
00166   // Copying necessary files
00167   std::string s=USER_INSTALL_PREFIX;
00168   s+="/share/RainbruRPG/";
00169   s+=file;
00170 
00171   LOGCATS("Returned value : '");
00172   LOGCATS(s.c_str());
00173   LOGCATS("'");
00174   LOGCAT();
00175 
00176   boost::filesystem::path test( s,boost::filesystem::native);
00177   if (!boost::filesystem::exists(test)){
00178     LOGW("The given file doesn't exist");
00179   }
00180 
00181   return s;
00182 }
00183 
00189 void RainbruRPG::Network::GlobalURI::
00190 installConfigFile(const std::string& filename)
00191 {
00192   // The $PREFIX/share... filename
00193   std::string s=USER_INSTALL_PREFIX;
00194   s+="/share/RainbruRPG/config/";
00195   s+=filename;
00196 
00197   // The $PREFIX/.RainbruRPG... filename
00198   std::string s2=userDir;
00199   s2+=filename;
00200 
00201   // The boost path
00202   boost::filesystem::path optionXmlPath( s, 
00203         boost::filesystem::native);
00204   boost::filesystem::path userOptionXmlPath( s2, 
00205         boost::filesystem::native);
00206 
00207   if (!boost::filesystem::exists(userOptionXmlPath)){
00208     std::string msg=filename;
00209     msg+=" not found, copying it from $PREFIX/share";
00210     LOGW(msg.c_str());
00211 
00212     boost::filesystem::copy_file(optionXmlPath, userOptionXmlPath);
00213   }
00214   else{
00215     std::string msg2=filename;
00216     msg2+=" found in user directory";
00217     LOGI(msg2.c_str());
00218   }
00219 }
